name: Simucities
description:
Simucities is a citybuilder in the vanes of the first Maxis "Simcity" game. But this game focus on the building part of the game more than the managment part. Build one of the over 60 buildings and try to make the best city you can imagin.

Controls:

Place objects: Mouse

Movements: W, A, S, D or arrow keys

We hope you enjoy the game for what it is and we will continue to bring updates to the game.
